024 * </table>
025 */
026@MessageProps(
027    opCode=-87, // 169
028    size=5,
029    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
030    request=BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest.class,
031    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_FUTURE
032)
033public class BolusPermissionChangeReasonResponse extends Message {
034    
035    private int bolusId;
036    private boolean isAcked;
037    private int lastChangeReasonId;
038    private boolean currentPermissionHolder;
039    
040    public BolusPermissionChangeReasonResponse() {}
041    
042    public BolusPermissionChangeReasonResponse(int bolusId, boolean isAcked, int lastChangeReasonId, boolean currentPermissionHolder) {
043        this.cargo = buildCargo(bolusId, isAcked, lastChangeReasonId, currentPermissionHolder);
044        this.bolusId = bolusId;
045        this.isAcked = isAcked;
046        this.lastChangeReasonId = lastChangeReasonId;
047        this.currentPermissionHolder = currentPermissionHolder;
048        
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * <table border="1">
053     * <caption>Parsed fields for BolusPermissionChangeReasonResponse:</caption>
054     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
055     * <tr><td><code>isAcked</code></td><td><code>raw[2] != 0</code></td></tr>
056     * <tr><td><code>lastChangeReasonId</code></td><td><code>raw[3]</code></td></tr>
057     * <tr><td><code>currentPermissionHolder</code></td><td><code>raw[4] != 0</code></td></tr>
058     * </table>
059     */
060    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
061        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
062        this.cargo = raw;
063        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 0);
064        this.isAcked = raw[2] != 0;
065        this.lastChangeReasonId = raw[3];
066        this.currentPermissionHolder = raw[4] != 0;
067        
068    }
069
070    
071    /**
072     * <table border="1">
073     * <caption>Byte layout for BolusPermissionChangeReasonResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
074     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
075     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
076     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
077     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>(byte) (isAcked ? 1 : 0)</code></td></tr>
078     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>(byte) lastChangeReason</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>(byte) (currentPermissionHolder ? 1 : 0)</code></td></tr>
080     * </table>
081     */
082    public static byte[] buildCargo(int bolusId, boolean isAcked, int lastChangeReason, boolean currentPermissionHolder) {
083        return Bytes.combine(
084            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId), 
085            new byte[]{ (byte) (isAcked ? 1 : 0) }, 
086            new byte[]{ (byte) lastChangeReason }, 
087            new byte[]{ (byte) (currentPermissionHolder ? 1 : 0) });
088    }
089    
090    public int getBolusId() {
091        return bolusId;
092    }
093    public boolean getIsAcked() {
094        return isAcked;
095    }
096    public int getLastChangeReasonId() {
097        return lastChangeReasonId;
098    }
099    public ChangeReason getLastChangeReason() {
100        return ChangeReason.fromId(lastChangeReasonId);
101    }
102    public boolean getCurrentPermissionHolder() {
103        return currentPermissionHolder;
104    }
105
106    public enum ChangeReason {
107        GRANTED(0),
108        RELEASED(1),
109        REVOKED_PRIORITY(2),
110        REVOKED_TIMEOUT(3),
111        REVOKED_SETTINGS_CHANGED(4),
112        REVOKED_PUMP_SUSPEND(5),
113        REVOKED_INVALID_REQUEST(6),
114        UNKNOWN(7),
115        ;
116        private final int id;
117        ChangeReason(int id) {
118            this.id = id;
119        }
120
121        public int getId() { return id; }
122
123        public static ChangeReason fromId(int id) {
124            for (ChangeReason r : values()) {
125                if (r.id == id) {
126                    return r;
127                }
128            }
129            return null;
130        }
131    }
132}
